snippet: The Spanish nurse who contracted Ebola while caring for two infected priests in a Madrid hospital, becoming the first person to contract the virus outside West Africa, appears to have overcome the deadly disease, the government said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Spanish Ebola Nurse Appears Clear of Disease, Says Government
headline.main: Spanish Ebola Nurse Appears Clear of Disease, Says Government

lead_paragraph: The Spanish nurse who contracted Ebola while caring for two infected priests in a Madrid hospital, becoming the first person to contract the virus outside West Africa, appears to have overcome the deadly disease, the government said on Sunday.
